Government of Canada
Gun Laying and Positioning System Solicitation
# Solicitation Summary
Public Works and Government Services Canada is inviting proposals for the supply and delivery of a Gun Laying and Positioning System (GLPS). The winning supplier will provide the Department of National Defence with a system that enables accurate and reliable gun laying and positioning capabilities.

## Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: W8486-228557/A
* Supplied Goods/Services: Gun Laying and Positioning System
* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* Regions of Opportunity: Not Applicable
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest/Lower Bid
* Notice Status: Expired

## Delivery Dates
* Date of Delivery: To be confirmed ( bidder-supplied delivery schedule is expected)
